DOC.brief_title: Quality Recovery After Dexamethasone , Ondansetron Placebo Intrathecal Morphine Administration
DOC.detailed_description: This randomise , double-blinded trial approve Research Ethics Committee School Medical Health Sciences , Pontifical Catholic University São Paulo ( Sorocaba , São Paulo - Brazil ) , January 2017 , CAAE 58208015.7.0000.5373 ( Chairperson Prof. J.A . Costa ) . On day surgery , completion pre-anesthetic evaluation due explanation study , consent obtain . No participant take pre-anesthetic medication surgery . Subjects randomise use computer-generated ( www.random.org ) table random number 3 group : S ( saline ) , D ( dexamethasone 8 mg ) , O ( ondansetrona 4 mg ) . Group assignments seal sequentially numbered opaque envelope open patient inclusion study . All care provider , researcher , patient blind group assignment . Study 5-mL syrinx prepare nurse independent study . Normal saline ( 5 mL total volume ) , dexamethasone ( make 5 mL normal saline ) , ondansetrone 4 mg ( make 5 mL normal saline ) drawn syringe offer anesthesia provider opaque envelope open . After arrival operating room , standard ASA monitor apply . Immediately venoclysis , e.v . midazolam administer titrated dos achieve 3 4 Ramsay scale . Spinal puncture perform patient seat position median paramedian line L3-L4 L2-L3 interspace use 26-gauge Quincke needle . Anesthesia establish single bolus 0.5 % hyperbaric bupivacaine ( 17.5 mg ≥ 70 kg expect surgery duration > 150 minute 15 mg < 70 kg ) preservative-free morphine 0.1 mg. Normal saline use fluid replacement therapy . In case failure spinal anesthesia , technique repeat general approach perform patient exclude study . Titraded dos midazolam ( 10 mg ) propofol continuous infusion administer achieve perioperative sedation ( ≥4 Ramsay scale ) . Supplemental oxygen 5 L/min via vent mask administer surgery . PACU All patient transfer PACU . Data relate occurrence pain , nausea , vomit , pruritus , urinary retention time Aldrete score ≥ 9 PACU record . Pain assess every 15 minute use 0-10 numeric pain rating scale ( NRS ) , zero meant pain 10 bad imaginable pain . Morphine ( 1 2 mg ) administer intravenously every 10 minute maintain pain score 4 ( 1 mg pain score < 7 2 mg ≥7 ) . PONV treat dimenhydrinate ( 30 mg ) intravenously . Pruritus classify follow : 0 - symptom , 1 - 3 - mild symptom , 3 - 7 moderate symptom 7 - 10 - severe symptom . Nalbuphine 5 mg intravenously administer score > 4 . Ward Following discharge PACU ( minimum stay 60 minute Aldrete score ≥ 9 ) , participant give ketoprofen ( 100 mg ) every 12 hour dipyrone ( 30 mg.kg-1 , maximum 1 g ) every six hour intravenously . Whenever patient judge analgesia insufficient , tramadol ( 100 mg ) administer intravenously eight-hour minimum interval need . Postoperative nausea vomiting ( PONV ) treat dimenhydrinate ( 30 mg ) intravenously . An investigator blind group assignment collect postoperative outcome data 24 hour surgical procedure . Subjects ask rate high score pain ( NRS ) hospital ward stay . Tramadol consumption , occurrence urinary retention number nausea vomit episode also record . These finding confirm ward nursing staff . All subject stay hospital least 24 hour . Data Collection The baseline QoR-40 questionnaire complete subject informed consent obtain preoperative hold area 24 hour surgery blind investigator . The QoR-40 questionnaire evaluate five dimension recovery ( physical comfort - 12 item ; emotional state - 7 item ; physical independence - 5 item ; physiological support - 7 item ; pain - 7 item ) . Each item rat five-point Likert scale : none time , time , usually , time , time . The total score QoR-40 range 40 ( poor quality recovery ) 200 ( best quality recovery ) . The primary outcome interest QoR-40 score POD1 .
